(static) getContent(client, id, groupopt, elementopt, indexopt) → {Promise}

Get raw access to DICOM tags. If both group and element are provided, get raw access to the value of the targeted DICOM tag. If index is also provided, get raw access to the targeted DICOM sequence value.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
client Client Client which will be used to perform the request
id String Id of the targeted instance
group String <optional>
 Group number of the targeted element
element String <optional>
 Element number of the targeted value
index Integer <optional>
 Index number of the targeted sequence value
Source:
  • lib/instances.js, line 60
Returns:
The expected value is either an array containing Strings, either a String (if group and element are both provided)
Type
Promise

(static) getFrame(client, id, frameNumber, frameFormatopt)

Get the frameNumber'th frame of the instance with the given id
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
client Client Client which will be used to perform the request
id String Id of the targeted instance
frameNumber Integer Index of the targeted frame
frameFormat String <optional>
 preview Wanted format for the targeted frame. Must be image-int16, image-uint16, image-uint8, matlab or preview
Source:
  • lib/instances.js, line 159
